item_groups.name: Hellfire Missile
item_groups.description: The Hellfire AGM-114 missile, made by Lockheed Martin, is a laser-guided anti-tank missile meant to be fired from helicopters and drones. They are qualified for use on Israeli-used aircraft such as the Boeing AH-64 Apache and the Sikorsky UH-60 Black Hawk. There are different variants of Hellfire missiles.
item_groups.notes: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin semper maximus convallis.

item_groups.name: Joint Direct Attack Munition (JDAM)
item_groups.description: The JDAM is a guidance kit developed by Boeing that converts unguided bombs into all-weather precision-guided munitions. The system uses GPS to improve accuracy and is used by multiple air forces, including the Israeli Air Force.

item_groups.name: F-16 Fighting Falcon
item_groups.description: A multirole fighter aircraft developed by General Dynamics and widely used worldwide. The F-16 is known for its maneuverability and advanced avionics. Israel operates a fleet of F-16s, often modified for specific combat needs.

item_groups.name: Merkava Tank
item_groups.description: The Merkava is the main battle tank used by the Israel Defense Forces (IDF). It is known for its emphasis on crew protection and firepower. The latest model, the Merkava Mk4, features advanced armor and active protection systems.

item_groups.name: Iron Dome
item_groups.description: An advanced missile defense system developed by Israel to intercept short-range rockets and artillery shells. It has been credited with intercepting thousands of incoming projectiles.

item_groups.name: Spike Missile
item_groups.description: A family of fire-and-forget anti-tank guided missiles developed by Israel's Rafael Advanced Defense Systems. The Spike missile is widely used and exported to numerous countries.

item_groups.name: Apache Helicopter
item_groups.description: The Boeing AH-64 Apache is an advanced attack helicopter used by the IDF. It is heavily armed with Hellfire missiles, a 30mm chain gun, and Hydra 70 rockets.

item_groups.name: DIME Bombs
item_groups.description: Dense Inert Metal Explosives (DIME) are controversial munitions believed to cause severe injuries with limited blast radii. Reports suggest their use in conflict zones, raising ethical and humanitarian concerns.

item_groups.name: White Phosphorus
item_groups.description: A controversial incendiary weapon used for battlefield illumination and smoke screens. Its use in populated areas is highly criticized due to its severe burns and long-lasting effects.

item_groups.name: F-35 Lightning II
item_groups.description: A fifth-generation stealth fighter jet used by the Israeli Air Force. The F-35 provides advanced radar evasion capabilities and state-of-the-art avionics for precision strikes.

item_groups.name: GBU-39 Small Diameter Bomb
item_groups.description: A precision-guided glide bomb designed for high accuracy with minimal collateral damage. It has been used in various conflicts, including airstrikes in Gaza.

item_groups.name: Tavor Assault Rifle
item_groups.description: A modern Israeli-made assault rifle used by the IDF. The Tavor is designed for urban warfare with a compact, ergonomic bullpup configuration.

item_groups.name: Thermal Battery
item_groups.description: Provides power to missile systems during flight, activated upon launch.
item_groups.notes: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin semper maximus convallis. Sed accumsan maximus lectus et tincidunt. Etiam venenatis dolor.

item_groups.name: Missile Guidance System
item_groups.description: Controls missile trajectory using sensors and algorithms to reach the target.

item_groups.name: Rocket Motor
item_groups.description: Propels the missile through combustion of solid or liquid propellants.

item_groups.name: Seeker Head
item_groups.description: Detects and locks onto targets using infrared or radar technology.
item_groups.notes: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin semper maximus convallis. Sed accumsan maximus lectus et tincidunt. Etiam venenatis dolor.

item_groups.name: Warhead
item_groups.description: Explosive payload designed to destroy or disable the target upon impact.

item_groups.name: Control Fins
item_groups.description: Aerodynamic surfaces that steer and stabilize the missile in flight.

item_groups.name: Propellant
item_groups.description: Chemical substance that fuels the rocket motor for propulsion.

item_groups.name: Launch Tube
item_groups.description: Encases the missile before launch and guides its initial trajectory.
item_groups.notes: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin semper maximus convallis. Sed accumsan maximus lectus et tincidunt. Etiam venenatis dolor.

item_groups.name: Infrared Sensor
item_groups.description: Utilizes infrared sensors to detect and analyze heat emissions from potential targets, allowing for precise target acquisition and continuous tracking throughout the missile's flight path. This system is capable of distinguishing between background thermal noise and actual targets, enhancing accuracy in complex environments.

item_groups.name: Targeting Software
item_groups.description: Receives and interprets real-time data from navigation, guidance, and target-tracking systems to compute optimal flight paths and engagement parameters. This processing ensures the missile dynamically adapts to changing conditions, threats, and target movements, maximizing mission success and minimizing collateral impact.

item_groups.name: Communication System
item_groups.description: Facilitates secure and continuous communication between the missile and external command centers or launch platforms, enabling updates to mission parameters, in-flight course corrections, and telemetry feedback. This data link ensures real-time responsiveness and system-wide coordination during operations.

item_groups.name: Missile Body Casing
item_groups.description: Comprises a reinforced external casing engineered to shield sensitive internal subsystems from environmental hazards, thermal stress, and high-speed aerodynamic forces encountered during launch, flight, and impact. This structural enclosure also contributes to the missile's aerodynamic stability and overall integrity under extreme operational conditions.

item_groups.name: GPS Receiver
item_groups.description: Utilizes signals from multiple Global Positioning System (GPS) satellites to calculate the missile’s exact geographic coordinates in real-time. This high-precision positioning enables accurate navigation and target alignment, even over long distances or in complex terrains, significantly improving mission reliability.

item_groups.name: Inertial Measurement Unit
item_groups.description: Incorporates a suite of gyroscopes and accelerometers to continuously measure the missile’s angular position, acceleration, and velocity. This inertial data forms the backbone of the missile’s guidance system, ensuring stable flight control and precise maneuverability even in environments where external navigation signals may be lost or degraded.

item_groups.name: Control Guidance Electronics
item_groups.description: Analyzes real-time input from GPS, inertial sensors, and other guidance sources to continuously compute and implement necessary course corrections. This dynamic adjustment capability allows the missile to maintain its intended trajectory, respond to unexpected obstacles, and accurately home in on its target despite environmental or operational changes.

item_groups.name: Tail Kit Assembly
item_groups.description: Rear section that includes control surfaces for flight stabilization and guidance.

item_groups.name: Fuze System
item_groups.description: Triggers the warhead detonation at a precise moment based on impact or proximity.

item_groups.name: Satellite Communication Module
item_groups.description: Maintains long-range communication with command units via satellite links.

item_groups.name: Impact Sensor
item_groups.description: Detects collision or sudden deceleration to trigger detonation.

item_groups.name: Smart Bomb Processor
item_groups.description: Computes target trajectory and fusing logic in precision-guided munitions.

item_groups.name: Blast Fragmentation Warhead
item_groups.description: Explodes into high-velocity fragments to maximize damage over an area.

item_groups.name: Navigation Antenna
item_groups.description: Receives navigation signals such as GPS for precise guidance.

item_groups.name: Electronic Warfare Protection
item_groups.description: Shields systems from jamming or interference during operation.

item_groups.name: Missile Frame
item_groups.description: Structural framework that supports and integrates all missile components.
